# General =====

  * **Type:** - Matrix Processing
  * **Heading:** - Imputation
  * **Source code:** [ReplaceImputedByNan.cs](https://github.com/JurgenCox/perseus-plugins/blob/master/PerseusPluginLib/Impute/ReplaceImputedByNan.cs)

# Brief description

Replaces all values that have been imputed with `NaN`.

Output: Same matrix but with imputed values deleted.
